    A Function that casts objects to some type.

      • handleFailure

        protected RuntimeException handleFailure​(Object obj,
                                         ClassCastException e)
        Generate an exception to throw when a cast failure occurs.

        The implementation in CastFunction just throws e.

        Parameters:
        obj - object on which cast failed
        e - resulting exception
        Returns:
        exception to throw
